title: Man Who Knew The Las Vegas Shooter - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/17/17
itunes:title: Man Who Knew The Las Vegas Shooter - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/17/17
description:
George Noory and a man named John who worked in one of the casinos frequented by the Las Vegas shooter discuss his impressions of Steven Paddock, and whether he saw any warning signs of violent behavior before the deadly attack.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
